DeviceFirmware.ReleaseNote:
Release version: 1.7.0 Release date: November 18, 2021
Details • Fixed: SideTone functionality • Fixed: Loss of call control after pc sleep mode with Teams in certain cases • Updated: audio behavior • Updated: LED functionality • Updated: mute functionality • Performance and stability improvements

Setting.Name: VOICE_TAGS2
Setting.UiDescription: Select if voice or sound shall be used for audio feedback to user. Select off if no audio feedback is wanted.

Setting.Name: BUTTON_SOUNDS
Setting.UiDescription: Sounds will be played in your headset in different states (e.g. when you reach the highest or lowest volume level).

Setting.Name: BUSYLIGHT
Setting.UiDescription: Enable the busylight function on the headset.

Setting.Name: INTELLITONE_LEVEL
Setting.ValueRangeUiLabels: Leave unchanged,Basic PeakStop protection,IntelliTone average daily audio exposure,Australian acoustic safety guideline (G.616)
Setting.UiDescription: Select to automatically adjust the volume level in the headset to limit your daily exposure to excessive audio volume. The headset always provides protection against sound spikes.

Setting.Name: INTELLITONE_SOUND_LEVEL
Setting.UiDescription: Select the decibel level above which the headset protects against sound spikes.

Setting.Name: MUTE_REMINDER_INTERVAL
Setting.UiDescription: Use a periodic audio reminder when the microphone is muted.

Setting.Name: SIDETONE_MUTE
Setting.UiDescription: Sidetone creates a more natural sound experiences, by enabling you to hear your own voice when talking in the headset. Audio from the microphone is reproduced in the headset, so you can hear your own voice. Sidetone does not affect how other people hear your voice.

Setting.Name: ASSET_TAG_V2
Setting.UiDescription: Personalize the name used for the headset.

SettingValidatorSettingMapping.ErrorMessage: Please enter valid Headset name tag

Setting.Name: INTERNAL_SETTING_FOR_ASSET_TAG_V2
Setting.UiDescription: Enable Headset name tag

Setting.Name: SIDETONE_LEVEL
Setting.UiDescription: Select the decibel level of sidetone.

Setting.Name: HS_RINGER_SOFTPHONE
Setting.UiDescription: Use a ringtone in the headset to announce incoming softphone calls.

Setting.Name: SOFTPHONE_INTEGRATION
Setting.UiDescription: Enable remote call control between the headset and controller and a softphone. Turn off this setting if multiple softphones are installed.

Setting.Name: LOGIN_PASSWORD
Setting.UiDescription: Enter a password for protection of some settings.

Setting.Name: INTERNAL_SETTING_FOR_LOGIN_PASSWORD
Setting.UiDescription: Protect settings

InternalSettings.Name: CURRENT_LANGUAGE
InternalSettings.UiDescription: This setting selects the touchscreen language.

DeviceFirmware.ReleaseNote:
